description:
Karen is looking to cash in her date offer from the confident - but forgetful - Imadori, so Tenma takes her place in a wrestling match.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Karen no Koi, Madamada / Karen no Koi, Bochibochi / Karen no Koi, Soshite...
Karen und die Liebe, Karen und..., Karen...
Karen`s Love, Not Yet! / Karen`s Love, Little by Little! / Karen`s Love, and Then...
Karenin rakkaus, ei vielä. Karenin rakkaus, hitaasti ja sitten...
かれんの恋, まだまだ / かれんの恋, ぼちぼち / かれんの恋, そして...
